Text: @big_dad_e: Why do you label this film as 2004? It came out in 1948. It is a classic and a great film so its no problem in that regard, but labeling it as a 2004 film misleads people reading your description. I thought that it was perhaps a remake like TRUE GRIT is a remake of a much much older Western starring John Wayne.  Had I known from the torrent description that it was the 1948 original movie (which I have seen a million times!!!), I would have NEVER even bothered to come to your download page. That is all, END OF LINE.
MY bad   big_dad_e  I mis read your description, it does say 1948. I could have sworn when I looked earlier, it was 2004. I stand corrected.
